dt-option.name: searchPanes.layout
dt-option.summary: Set the layout of how the panes are displayed on the page

type.description: This property has a variety of possible values. The default value is `'auto'` When this is in place, SearchPanes will fit the panes to their best fit on the page, including responsively. By setting the `-init searchPanes.layout` to `columns-%d` the searchPanes are displayed in columns, with %d panes in each column.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.layout` parameter is `'auto'`. This will allow SearchPanes to fit the panes optimally depending on the size of the display.
dt-option.description:
This property has a variety of possible values. The default value is `'auto'` When this is in place, SearchPanes will fit the panes to their best fit on the page, including responsively. By setting the `-init searchPanes.layout` parameter to `columns-3`, the panes will be displayed in 3 columns.
There are 9 sizes supported from 1 pane in a row to 9 panes in a row. Altering the number at the end of `columns-` will alter the number of panes on a row.

example.title: Set the number of panes in a row to 2
